verses.verse: Then these <S%H428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> answering <S%H6030><s%> Job, <S%H347><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he was righteous <S%H6662><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

But the anger <S%H639><s%> of Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite, <S%H940><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of Ram <S%H7410><s%> burned; <S%H2734><s%> against Job <S%H347><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> burned, <S%H2734><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> he justified <S%H6663><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

And his anger <S%H639><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against his three <S%H7969><s%> friends <S%H7453><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> they had found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> answer, <S%H4617><s%> and yet had condemned <S%H7561><s%> Job. <S%H347><s%>
Now Elihu <S%H453><s%> had waited <S%H2442><s%> to speak <S%H1697><s%> to Job <S%H347><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were years <S%H3117><s%> older <S%H2205><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> he.

And when Elihu <S%H453><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> answer <S%H4617><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> burned. <S%H2734><s%>

So Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite <S%H940><s%> spoke <S%H6030><s%> out and said, <S%H559><s%> "I am young <S%H6810><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%> and you are old; <S%H3453><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I was shy <S%H2119><s%> and afraid <S%H3372><s%> to tell <S%H2331><s%> you what <S%H1843><s%> I think. <S%H1843><s%>
"I thought <S%H559><s%> age <S%H3117><s%> should speak, <S%H1696><s%> And increased <S%H7230><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> should teach <S%H3045><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
"But it is a spirit <S%H7307><s%> in man, <S%H582><s%> And the breath <S%H5397><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> gives <S%H995><s%> them understanding. <S%H995><s%>
"The abundant <S%H7227><s%> [in years] may not be wise, <S%H2449><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> may elders <S%H2205><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%>
"So <S%H3651><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> 'Listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, I too <S%H637><s%> will tell <S%H2331><s%> what <S%H1843><s%> I think. <S%H1843><s%>'

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I waited <S%H3176><s%> for your words, <S%H1697><s%> I listened <S%H238><s%> to your reasonings, <S%H8394><s%> While <S%H5704><s%> you pondered <S%H2713><s%> what <S%H4405><s%> to say. <S%H4405><s%>

"I even paid <S%H995><s%> close <S%H995><s%> attention <S%H995><s%> to you, Indeed, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who refuted <S%H3198><s%> Job, <S%H347><s%> Not one of you who answered <S%H6030><s%> his words. <S%H561><s%>
"Do not say, <S%H559><s%> 'We have found <S%H4672><s%> wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> God <S%H410><s%> will rout <S%H5086><s%> him, not man. <S%H376><s%>'
"For he has not arranged <S%H6186><s%> [his] words <S%H4405><s%> against <S%H413><s%> me; Nor <S%H3808><s%> will I reply <S%H7725><s%> to him with your arguments. <S%H561><s%>
"They are dismayed, <S%H2865><s%> they answer <S%H6030><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more; <S%H5750><s%> Words <S%H4405><s%> have failed <S%H6275><s%> them.
"And shall I wait, <S%H3176><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they do not speak, <S%H1696><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> they stop <S%H5975><s%> [and] answer <S%H6030><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%>?
"I too <S%H637><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> my share, <S%H2506><s%> I also <S%H637><s%> will tell <S%H2331><s%> my opinion. <S%H1843><s%>
"For I am full <S%H4390><s%> of words; <S%H4405><s%> The spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H990><s%> me constrains <S%H6693><s%> me.
"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my belly <S%H990><s%> is like unvented <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6605><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> Like new <S%H2319><s%> wineskins <S%H178><s%> it is about to burst. <S%H1234><s%>
"Let me speak <S%H1696><s%> that I may get <S%H7304><s%> relief; <S%H7304><s%> Let me open <S%H6605><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> and answer. <S%H6030><s%>
"Let me now <S%H4994><s%> be partial <S%H5375><s%> <S%H6440><s%> to no <S%H408><s%> one; <S%H376><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> flatter <S%H3655><s%> [any] man. <S%H120><s%>
"For I do not know <S%H3045><s%> how to flatter, <S%H3655><s%> [Else] my Maker <S%H6213><s%> would soon <S%H4592><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> me away.
